name: Altech Software
overview:
Altech Software Limited designs and develops software products for the food industry. It offers VisionTQM, a food safety management software module; VisionMobile, a wireless mobile data collection system; VisionPDM that manages various aspects of product specification from recipe development and nutritional data calculation to costing, labeling information, and allergen content; VisionAQL, a management tool for quality control; and VisionADC, a real time data collection and processing software for manufacturing processes that require automated quality/safety monitoring programs. The company also provides food safety and HACCP consultation, training, and auditing services, as well as management consultancy for food industry covering various aspects of QA/QC, such as supplier management and incoming goods control; process control, re-engineering, and Improvement; total enterprise business and strategic corporate management enhancement; and software solutions for various processes. In addition, it offers information technology management consultancy services, including selection and implementation of various enterprise resource planning, automated warehouse, technical, and human resource and T&A systems, as well as Internet based platforms; and general management services.

The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Cwmbran, the United Kingdom.
